org.jslipc.channel

Interface JslipcChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Channel, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReadableJslipcByteChannel, WritableJslipcByteChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBbqChannel, AbstractChunkFileChannel, AbstractJslipcFileChannel, ReadableBbqChannel, ReadableChunkFileChannel, ReadableJslipcFileChannel, WritableBbqChannel, WritableChunkFileChannel, WritableJslipcFileChannel

    public interface JslipcChannel
extends Channel
    Common interface for all channels.
